statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age, location FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, name, total_purchases FROM customer_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, gender, total_purchases FROM customer_data ORDER BY total_purchases DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, total_purchases FROM customer_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND total_purchases > 100 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY age DESC, total_purchases ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender, location, total_purchases FROM customer_data WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM BuyingBehavior WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics INNER JOIN BuyingBehavior ON CustomerDemographics.customer_id = BuyingBehavior.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM BuyingBehavior WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, income, education_level FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id=d.customer_id WHERE d.children_count > 2;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT customer_name, income, education_level FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level IN ('Bachelor', 'Master') ORDER BY customer_name LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name, quantity, price FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price < 50 AND quantity > 3 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, location, marital_status, children_count FROM customers INNER JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE marital_status='Married' AND children_count >= 2 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price;
SELECT income, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE has_children = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, income, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND has_children = TRUE ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE availability = True;
SELECT campaign_name, target_age_group, target_gender FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.conversion_rate, cr.total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id ORDER BY cr.conversion_rate DESC;
